Trade/Device Name(s): LIAISON® VCA IgG Serum Control Set
LIAISON® EBNA IgG Serum Control Set
Analyte(s): IgG antibodies to Epstein-Barr virus (EBV) viral capsid antigen (VCA)
IgG antibodies to Epstein-Barr virus (EBV) nuclear antigen (EBNA-1)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for DiaSorin LIAISON VCA IgG, EBNA IgG assays and corresponding Serum Control Sets for qualitative detection of EBV-specific IgG antibodies using chemiluminescent immunoassay on LIAISON platforms.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative determination of specific IgG antibodies to EBV VCA or EBNA in human serum as an aid, with other EBV markers, in laboratory diagnosis of Epstein-Barr Viral Syndrome in patients with signs and symptoms of EBV infection such as infectious mononucleosis; Serum Control Sets used to monitor assay performance on LIAISON analyzers.
